outcome: Technocrats announce minor system reforms to stabilize the city temporarily.

events.description: Technocrats unveil minor BCI upgrades designed to ease service access, reducing public frustrations.
Internal meetings reveal heightened surveillance protocols; dissenting voices within the Council are silenced.
Leaders privately express doubts about the long-term efficacy of minor reforms but publicly declare success.
Stenograd citizens cautiously resume daily activities, feeling superficial stability amid unresolved concerns.
